contents.item: Let your neighbor’s needs be your concern
Serve the Lord with what you have — your substance, strength, knowledge, and ability
You are at liberty to develop yourself when you are self employed
Don't mistake activity with achievement.
Value-added time produces multiplication and production
Man is the carrier of God’s image
Uplifting God’s Kingdom on earth should be our life’s mandate as believers
Stop trying to make a living and begin to live
Your calling is in what you can do without noticing time
Work is not about survival alone
Be eager to explore new discoveries
Life evolved from time
Effectiveness of life is not in self aggrandising
God opens heavenly doors for us when we are rejected by people
True service is when you serve others without expecting anything in return
Your intensity increases your net worth
The ministry of Christ is based on people
Use your resources wisely and spend quality time on developing your resources
We bring glory to the Kingdom when we fellowship with one another
The compensation we receive from employment is not enough for the time being wasted
God is in your neighbor
Hide yourself in God, so when a man wants to find you he will have to go there first.
Living for your purpose is equivalent to living for the Kingdom of God
Your calling is buried in your background on earth
To live an effective life, you must understand the essence and secret of life
To live an effective life, you have to turn your back on the things of the world
Work is an instrument through which you build yourself
Your life content reduces with employment
Life should be used to fulfill the purposes of the Kingdom
It is only when we meet the needs of the people around us that God meets our needs
We should be blessings to others as believers
The key to an effective life is that things done for self don’t count
The first thing to do after you get fired is to discover God
The purpose of the Kingdom is the essence of life
Service to God is largely unacceptable without service to men
I have to serve with all my might.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Your gift or calling enables you to ask the question of what to do
Our behavior to ordinary people depicts our actual nature
It’s either you are converting your time or not
Joblessness sets you free psychologically
Don’t exert all your energy on employment, locate your purpose
The secret of effective living is detachment
Don’t equate effective living to being busy
A steward in the above scripture is a servant who serves.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Life is fulfilling when you are being productive
You are living to the fullest when you live to discover and fulfill your purpose
Being rich or famous does not equate an effective life
Living for your purposes warrants eternal blessings
Joblessness makes you live without the fear of being fired
The amount of value produced at a certain period depends on the level of focus used to attain it
An effective life is a life of purpose
Time spent adding value is not wasted
Life is all about discovery
Your net worth comes from your added value
We reject God when we reject people
Employment sells out the future life
The nature of Christ is love
The primary thing that determines how effective your life is how you carry out your calling
You have to be skillful in your time management to be productive
Time is God’s given asset to humans
You need to do an inventory of yourself to discover your calling and purpose
As believers, we each have a different essence of existence
The image of God is in every human
You can only reach God through His creation
The best way to appreciate God is to appreciate His creation
You can only build yourself effectively in the area of your calling
We glorify God when we encourage and bless His creation
The only need of God is in people
The only people remembered in history are the ones that dedicate their lives to service and purpose
Your destiny is connected with your calling
Appreciate others so that you can be appreciated
Your calling should bless and affect the lives of others for good
Time wasters are life wasters
Greatness is an attainment bought with the currency of time
You need to understand the principle of intensity to reclaim time
Nothing is possible without time
You need focus and concentration to be effective in life
You cannot discover God without discovering people
Only people who believe in themselves are able to do exploits
Love for people is the basis of our fellowship with God
Life is given to bring the will of God on earth
The best kind of happiness is a habit you're passionate about.
Serving people is more important to God than the religious activities we engage in
The value of a substance is the product of the time spent to achieve it
It is our responsibility as believers to bring the will of God to the people
Always have a list of what you want to achieve in life
Work to fulfill your calling
Our service as believers is not complete without fellowship with people
The vicious circle of life is employment
You cannot have a cordial relationship with God when you reject people
